title: Karamja Diary

properties.name: description
properties.value: For a list of every task sorted by certain requirements, see Achievement Diary/All achievements.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Karamja achievements

For a list of every task sorted by certain requirements, see Achievement Diary/All achievements.

Karamja Diary
Released 8 May 2007 (Update)
Area(s) Karamja, Kharazi Jungle
Members Yes
Item reward Gloves
Lamp XP rewards 1,000
5,000
10,000
50,000
Taskmaster(s) Pirate Jackie the Fruit
Levels required
Total level: 775
 ----  ----  52
 50  53  ----
 ----  87  65
 42  52  30
 40  ----  ----
 ----  ----  50
 91  50  72
 ----  41
100 ----

The Karamja Diary is a set of achievement diaries whose tasks revolve around areas within Karamja, which include the Kharazi Jungle and Mor Ul Rek. This is the first set of achievement diaries to be introduced into the game. The antique lamps earned from this set grant less experience than those of other sets.

Pirate Jackie the Fruit's location.

Several skill, quest and item requirements are needed to complete all tasks. Unless stated otherwise, temporary skill boosts can be used to meet the skill requirements.

Rewards can be claimed from Pirate Jackie the Fruit in the Brimhaven Agility Arena. Note that the previous tiers of a diary must be completed to claim rewards of the next tier.

Contents

  • 1 Overview
  • 2 Easy
    • 2.1 Rewards
  • 3 Medium
    • 3.1 Rewards
  • 4 Hard
    • 4.1 Rewards
  • 5 Elite
    • 5.1 Rewards
  • 6 Changes

Overview[edit | edit source]

The rewards can be claimed from Pirate Jackie the Fruit. She is located at the entrance to the Brimhaven Agility Arena.

Skill Requirements[1][2]
40
15
 
76+
Quest Requirements
None
Additional Requirements
None
  1. ↑ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ↑ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Karamja gloves 1
    • While worn, Brimhaven—Ardougne and Musa Point—Port Sarim boat trips will cost half (15 coins rather than 30)
    • Better deals in shops on Karamja when worn (shops sell items to you for ~13.3% fewer coins/tokkul/trading sticks and buy items from you for more)
  • Antique lamp worth 1,000 experience in any skill

Skill Requirements[1][2]
40
12
65
16
50
27
41
 
267+
Quest Requirements
The Grand Tree
Shilo Village
Additional Requirements
100% Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup Favour
Partial completion of Dragon Slayer I
Partial completion of Tai Bwo Wannai Trio
  1. ↑ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ↑ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Karamja gloves 2
    • While worn, increased Agility experience from redeeming Agility tickets
    • While worn, 10% additional Agility experience earned from all obstacles in the Brimhaven Agility Arena
  • Antique lamp worth 5,000 experience in any skill above 30
  • Access to the stepping stone shortcut across the river of Shilo Village requiring 77 Agility

Skill Requirements[1][2]

  1. ↑ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ↑ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.
  3. ↑ 3.0 3.1 59 for ironmen or access to the Ancient Cavern.

Rewards

  • Karamja gloves 3
    • Unlimited teleports to the underground portion of the Shilo Village mine
  • Antique lamp worth 10,000 experience in any skill above 40
  • Access to the underground portion of the Shilo Village mine

Skill Requirements[1][2]
87
91
72
 
292+
Quest Requirements
None
Additional Requirements
Own a fire cape or infernal cape
  1. ↑ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ↑ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Karamja gloves 4
    • Unlimited teleports to Duradel
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70
  • 10% chance of receiving 2 Agility arena tickets, instead of one, upon every successful pillar tag at the Brimhaven Agility Arena
  • Free usage of Shilo Village's furnace
  • Free cart rides on Hajedy's cart system
  • Free access to the Hardwood Grove
  • Access to the stepping stones shortcut leading to the red dragons in Brimhaven dungeon requiring 83 Agility
  • Red dragons in Brimhaven Dungeon will always drop noted red dragonhide
  • All Metal dragons, Bronze, Iron, and Steel, in Brimhaven Dungeon will drop their respective bars in noted form if toggled-on through Pirate Jackie the Fruit - can toggle on/off freely
  • 1 free resurrection, per day, in the TzHaar Fight Cave (Not the Inferno)
  • Double Tokkul from the TzHaar Fight Cave, the Inferno, and TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges

Easy[edit | edit source]

Easy task completed
The music that plays after completing an easy task.
Items Required
  • Any pickaxe
  • About 120 coins
  • Either a harpoon, lobster pot, small fishing net, fishing rod and bait, or Barbarian fishing
  • Equipment to kill a level 56 jogre
Skills Needed
  • 15 Agility
  • 40 Mining
Quests required
  • None
Task Requirements
1. Pick 5 bananas from the plantation located east of the volcano. None
2. Use the rope swing to travel to the Moss Giant Island north-west of Karamja.
  • 10 Agility
3. Mine some gold from the rocks on the north-west peninsula of Karamja.
  • 40 Mining
  • Any pickaxe
4. Travel to Port Sarim via the dock, east of Musa Point.
  • 30 coins or the Ring of charos (a)
5. Travel to Ardougne via the port near Brimhaven.
  • 30 coins or the Ring of charos (a)
6. Explore Cairn Isle to the west of Karamja.
  • 15 Agility
7. Use the fishing spots north of the banana plantation (any one of them).
  • Harpoon, lobster pot, small fishing net, a fishing rod with bait, or having unlocked bare-handed fishing.
8. Collect 5 seaweed from anywhere on Karamja.
You can just drop and pick up the same seaweed five times. 		None
9. Attempt the TzHaar Fight Pits or Fight Cave.
You can simply enter and leave. No actual attempt is necessary. 		None
10. Kill a jogre in the Pothole Dungeon.
  • Weaponry

Rewards[edit | edit source]

Easy tasks complete
The music that plays after completing all easy tasks.
  • Karamja gloves 1
    • While worn, Brimhaven—Ardougne and Musa Point—Port Sarim boat trips will cost half (15 coins rather than 30)
    • Better deals in shops on Karamja when worn (shops sell items to you for ~13.3% fewer coins/tokkul/trading sticks and buy items from you for more)
  • Antique lamp worth 1,000 experience in any skill

Medium[edit | edit source]

Medium task completed
The music that plays after completing a medium task.
Items Required
  • About 1615 coins
  • Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup items
  • Spider carcass
  • Skewer sticks or an arrow shaft
  • Gout tuber
  • Spade
  • Rake
  • Any fruit tree seed or sapling
  • Teasing stick
  • Knife
  • Logs
  • Any axe
  • Any pickaxe
  • 3 cut or uncut opal, jade, or red topaz gems
  • 300, 600, or 1200 trading sticks based on gem
  • Small fishing net
  • Karambwan vessel
  • Raw karambwanji
Skills Needed
  • 12 Agility
  • 16 Cooking
  • 27 Farming
  • 65 Fishing(boostable)
  • 41 Hunter
  • 40 Mining
  • 50 Woodcutting
Quests required
  • The Grand Tree
  • Partial completion of Tai Bwo Wannai Trio
  • Partial completion of Dragon Slayer I
  • Shilo Village
    • Jungle Potion
      • Druidic Ritual
Task Requirements
1. Claim a ticket from the Agility arena in Brimhaven.
  • 200 coins
  • Having at least 40 Agility is recommended, but not necessary
2. Discover hidden wall in the dungeon below the volcano.
  • Partial completion of Dragon Slayer I
3. Visit the Isle of Crandor via the dungeon below the volcano.
  • Partial completion of Dragon Slayer I
  • You must go through the wall, past the Lesser demons, then climb the rope to the surface of Crandor to complete the task.
4. Use Vigroy and Hajedy's cart service.
  • Completion of Shilo Village
  • 200 coins
5. Earn 100% favour in the Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup minigame.
  • Completion of Jungle Potion
  • 10 Woodcutting
  • Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup items
6. Cook a Spider on stick.

Alternatively, cook a spider on shaft.

  • 16 Cooking
  • Spider carcass and a skewer stick or an arrow shaft
7. Charter the Lady of the Waves from south of Cairn Isle to Port Khazard.
  • Completion of Shilo Village
  • Ship ticket or 25-50 coins (the number of coins needed is random)
8. Cut a log from a teak tree.
  • Completion of Jungle Potion
  • 35 Woodcutting
  • Any axe and either 100 trading sticks if cutting in Hardwood Grove, or a machete if cutting in Kharazi Jungle (requires starting the Legends' Quest).
9. Cut a log from a mahogany tree.
  • Completion of Jungle Potion
  • 50 Woodcutting
  • Any axe and either 100 trading sticks if cutting in Hardwood Grove, or a machete if cutting in Kharazi Jungle (requires starting the Legends' Quest).
10. Catch a karambwan.
  • Partial completion of Tai Bwo Wannai Trio
  • 65 Fishing(boostable)
  • Karambwan vessel, some raw karambwanji and a small fishing net
11. Exchange gems for a machete.

Speak to Murcaily about Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup, get some favour, fix at least one fence, then claim some sticks for helping. Safta Doc will then allow you to trade for machetes.

  • Completion of Jungle Potion
  • Gout tuber and 3 cut/uncut opal, jade or red topaz
  • Depending on the type of gems, respectively 300, 600 or 1200 trading sticks
12. Use the gnome glider to travel to Karamja.
  • Completion of The Grand Tree
13. Grow a healthy fruit tree in the patch near Brimhaven.
  • 27 Farming
  • Any fruit tree sapling, a spade and a rake
14. Trap a Horned Graahk.
  • 41 Hunter
  • Teasing stick, knife and any logs.
15. Chop the vines to gain deeper access to Brimhaven Dungeon.
  • 10 Woodcutting
  • Any axe and 875 coins
16. Cross the lava using the stepping stones within Brimhaven Dungeon (south-west of pipe squeeze with moss giants).
  • 10 Woodcutting and 12 Agility
  • Any axe and 875 coins
17. Climb the stairs within Brimhaven Dungeon.
  • 10 Woodcutting
  • Any axe and 875 coins
18. Charter a ship from the shipyard in the far east of Karamja.
  • Completion of The Grand Tree
  • 200 coins if travelling to Musa Point (or less with the Ring of charos (a) and/or completion of Cabin Fever)
19. Mine a red topaz from a gem rock.
Can be found in Shilo Village or within the Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup minigame.
  • Completion of Jungle Potion, and alternatively also Shilo Village
  • 40 Mining
  • Any pickaxe

Rewards[edit | edit source]

Medium tasks complete
The music that plays after completing all medium tasks.
  • Karamja gloves 2
    • While worn, increased Agility experience from redeeming Agility tickets
    • While worn, 10% additional Agility experience earned from all obstacles in the Brimhaven Agility Arena
  • Antique lamp worth 5,000 experience in any skill above 30
  • Access to the stepping stone shortcut across the river of Shilo Village requiring 77 Agility

Hard[edit | edit source]

Hard task completed
The music that plays after completing a hard task.
Items Required
  • Oomlie wrap
  • Pure essence
  • Nature talisman or Abyss access
  • 875 coins
  • Raw karambwan
  • Any axe
  • Machete
  • Any pickaxe
  • Lockpick (bring multiple, as they can break)
  • Any crossbow
  • Mith grapple
  • Anti-dragon shield
  • Antifire potions
Skills Needed
  • 100 Combat level
  • 53 Agility
  • 53 Cooking
  • 59 Magic
  • 52 Mining
  • 42 Ranged
  • 44 Runecraft
  • 50 Slayer
  • 40 Smithing
  • 50 Strength
  • 50 Thieving
  • 34 Woodcutting
Quests required
  • Tai Bwo Wannai Trio
  • Partial completion of Legends' Quest
    • Family Crest
    • Waterfall Quest
    • Heroes' Quest
      • Shield of Arrav
      • Lost City
      • Merlin's Crystal
      • Dragon Slayer I
    • Shilo Village
      • Jungle Potion
        • Druidic Ritual
    • Underground Pass
      • Biohazard
        • Plague City
Task Requirements
1. Become the champion of the Fight Pit.
It's possible to do this with only two people total in the pit, yourself included.
  • Combat gear
2. Kill a Ket-Zek in the Fight Caves.
  • Combat gear
3. Eat an oomlie wrap.
  • Oomlie wrap, or the requirements to make it ( 50 Cooking, palm leaf and a raw oomlie)
4. Craft some nature runes from essence.
  • 44 Runecraft
  • Pure or daeyalt essence, and a nature talisman or access to the Abyss
5. Cook a raw karambwan thoroughly.
  • Completion of Tai Bwo Wannai Trio (speak to Tinsay after the quest)
  • 30 Cooking
6. Kill a deathwing in the dungeon under the Kharazi Jungle.
  • Partial completion of Legends' Quest
  • 15 Woodcutting, 50 Strength, 50 Agility, 50 Thieving and 52 Mining
  • Any axe, machete, pickaxe and a lockpick
7. Use the crossbow shortcut south of the volcano.
  • 53 Agility, 42 Ranged and 21 Strength
  • Any crossbow and a mith grapple
8. Collect 5 palm leaves.
You can pick up and drop the same palm leaf five times.
  • Partial completion of Legends' Quest
  • 15 Woodcutting
  • Any axe, and a machete or level 79 Agility
9. Be assigned a Slayer task by Duradel in Shilo Village.
  • Completion of Shilo Village
  • 100 Combat level and 50 Slayer, or 99 Slayer
10. Kill a metal dragon in Brimhaven Dungeon.
  • Combat gear, protection from dragonfire (such as a super antifire potion), 875 coins and any axe

Rewards[edit | edit source]

Hard tasks complete
The music that plays after completing all hard tasks.
  • Karamja gloves 3
    • Unlimited teleports to the underground portion of the Shilo Village mine
  • Antique lamp worth 10,000 experience in any skill above 40
  • Access to the underground portion of the Shilo Village mine

Elite[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Nature tiara
  • 28 pure essence
  • Fire cape or Infernal cape
  • Palm tree seed or sapling
  • Antidote++
  • 5-20 Zulrah's scales
  • Calquat tree seed or sapling
Skills Needed
  • 72 Farming
  • 87 Herblore
  • 91 Runecraft
Quests required
  • None
Task Requirements
1. Craft 56 nature runes at once from essence.
  • 91 Runecraft
  • 28 pure or daeyalt essence, and a nature tiara or access to the Abyss
2. Equip a fire cape or infernal cape in the Tzhaar city.
  • Great combat skills and equipment to achieve one of these capes
  • Fire cape or infernal cape
3. Check the health of a palm tree in Brimhaven.
  • 68 Farming
  • Palm sapling, spade and rake
  • Recommended: 15 papaya fruit to pay the gardener
4. Create an antivenom potion whilst standing in the horse shoe mine.
  • 87 Herblore
  • Antidote++ and 5-20 Zulrah's scales (5 per dose)
5. Check the health of your Calquat tree patch.
  • 72 Farming
  • Calquat sapling, spade and rake
  • Recommended: 8 poison ivy berries to pay the gardener

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Karamja gloves 4
    • Unlimited teleports to Duradel
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70
  • 10% chance of receiving 2 Agility arena tickets, instead of one, upon every successful pillar tag at the Brimhaven Agility Arena
  • Free usage of Shilo Village's furnace
  • Free cart rides on Hajedy's cart system
  • Free access to the Hardwood Grove
  • Access to the stepping stones shortcut leading to the red dragons in Brimhaven dungeon requiring 83 Agility
  • Red dragons in Brimhaven Dungeon will always drop noted red dragonhide
  • All Metal dragons, Bronze, Iron, and Steel, in Brimhaven Dungeon will drop their respective bars in noted form if toggled-on through Pirate Jackie the Fruit - can toggle on/off freely
  • 1 free resurrection, per day, in the TzHaar Fight Cave (Not the Inferno)
  • Double Tokkul from the TzHaar Fight Cave, the Inferno, and TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 April 2021
(update)

All diary tasks to craft runes were changed to clarify they only can be completed with essence.

30 March 2017
(update)

Pirate Jackie the Fruit is now the diary master for all of tiers retiring Kaleb Paramaya, the Jungle forester, and TzHaar-Mej.

16 July 2015
(update)

Fixed misspelling of "receive" in Ardougne, Karamja, Morytania and Wilderness Diaries.

30 April 2015
(update)
  • Karamja diary now checks for the elite tasks being completed before stating you have completed all of the tasks.
  • You are no longer directed towards 'someone somewhere' after completing the Karamja Elite tasks.
v • d • e

This is the first set of achievement diaries to be introduced into the game. The [[Antique lamp (Karamja Diary)|antique lamps]] earned from this set grant less experience than those of other sets. {{Map|name=Pirate Jackie the Fruit|x=2809|y=3193|r=3|mtype=square|align=left|height=250|width=250|caption=Pirate Jackie the Fruit's location.}} Several skill, quest and item requirements are needed to complete all tasks. Unless stated otherwise, [[temporary skill boost]]s can be used to meet the skill requirements. Rewards can be claimed from [[Pirate Jackie the Fruit]] in the [[Brimhaven]] [[Brimhaven Agility Arena|Agility Arena]]. style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- | 1. Pick 5 [[banana]]s from the [[Banana plantation|plantation]] located east of the [[Karamja Volcano|volcano]]. |{{NA|None}} |- | 2. Use the rope swing to travel to the [[Moss Giant Island]] north-west of [[Karamja]]. | *{{SCP|Agility|10|link=yes}} |- | 3. Mine some [[gold ore|gold]] from the rocks on the north-west peninsula of [[Karamja]]. | *{{SCP|Mining|40|link=yes}} *Any [[pickaxe]] |- | 4. Travel to [[Port Sarim]] via the dock, east of [[Musa Point]]. | *30 [[coins]] or the [[Ring of charos (a)]] |- | 5. Travel to [[Ardougne]] via the port near [[Brimhaven]]. | *30 [[coins]] or the [[Ring of charos (a)]] |- | 6. Explore [[Cairn Isle]] to the west of [[Karamja]]. | *{{SCP|Agility|15|link=yes}} |- | 7. Use the [[fishing spots]] north of the [[banana plantation]] (any one of them). | *[[Harpoon]], [[lobster pot]], [[small fishing net]], a [[fishing rod]] with [[Fishing bait|bait]], or having unlocked [[Barbarian_Training#Barbarian_Fishing|bare-handed fishing]]. |- | 8. Collect 5 [[seaweed]] from anywhere on [[Karamja]].
''You can just drop and pick up the same seaweed five times.'' |{{NA|None}} |- | 9. Attempt the [[TzHaar Fight Pit]]s or [[Fight Cave]].
''You can simply enter and leave. No actual attempt is necessary.'' |{{NA|None}} |- | 10. Kill a [[jogre]] in the [[Pothole Dungeon]]. | *[[Weaponry]] |} ===Rewards=== {{Listen |align = right |title = Easy tasks complete |filename = Karamja Diary - all easy tasks complete.ogg |desc = The music that plays after completing all easy tasks.}} *[[Karamja gloves 1]] **While worn, [[Brimhaven]]—[[Ardougne]] and [[Musa Point]]—[[Port Sarim]] boat trips will cost half (15 [[coins]] rather than 30) **Better deals in shops on Karamja when worn (shops sell items to you for ~13.3% fewer [[coins]]/[[tokkul]]/[[trading sticks]] and buy items from you for more) *[[Antique lamp (Karamja Diary)|Antique lamp]] worth 1,000 experience in any skill ==Medium== {{Listen |align = right |title = Medium task completed |filename = Karamja Diary - medium task completed.ogg |desc = The music that plays after completing a medium task.}} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *About 1615 [[coins]] *[[Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup#Necessary items|Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup items]] *[[Spider carcass]] *[[Skewer stick]]s or an [[arrow shaft]] *[[Gout tuber]] *[[Spade]] *[[Rake]] *Any [[fruit tree seed]] or [[sapling]] *[[Teasing stick]] *[[Knife]] *[[Logs]] *Any [[axe]] *Any [[pickaxe]] *3 cut or uncut [[opal]], [[jade]], or [[red topaz]] [[gems]] *300, 600, or 1200 [[trading sticks]] based on gem *[[Small fishing net]] *[[Karambwan vessel]] *[[Raw karambwanji]] }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Skills Needed |- | {{Checklist| *{{SCP|Agility|12|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Cooking|16|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Farming|27|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Fishing|65|link=yes}}{{boostable|yes}} *{{SCP|Hunter|41|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Mining|40|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Woodcutting|50|link=yes}} }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Quests required |- | {{Checklist|smallindent=yes|notoggleparent=yes| *[[The Grand Tree]] *Partial completion of [[Tai Bwo Wannai Trio]] *Partial completion of [[Dragon Slayer I]] *[[Shilo Village]] **[[Jungle Potion]] ***[[Druidic Ritual]] }} |} {| class="wikitable lighttable qc-active diary-table" style=width:750px; data-diary-name="Karamja" data-diary-tier="Medium" ! style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- | 1. Claim a ticket from the [[Brimhaven Agility Arena|Agility arena]] in [[Brimhaven]]. | *200 [[coins]] *''Having at least {{SCP|Agility|40|link=yes}} is recommended, but not necessary'' |- | 2. Discover hidden wall in the [[Crandor and Karamja Dungeon|dungeon]] below the [[Karamja Volcano|volcano]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Partial completion of [[Dragon Slayer I]] |- | 3. Visit the Isle of [[Crandor]] via the [[Crandor and Karamja Dungeon|dungeon]] below the [[Karamja Volcano|volcano]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Partial completion of [[Dragon Slayer I]] *You ''must'' go through the [[Wall (Crandor and Karamja Dungeon)|wall]], past the [[Lesser demon]]s, then climb the rope to the surface of [[Crandor]] to complete the task. |- | 4. Use [[Vigroy]] and [[Hajedy]]'s [[Hajedy's cart|cart service]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Shilo Village]] *200 [[coins]] |- | 5. Earn 100% favour in the [[Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup]] minigame. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Jungle Potion]] *{{SCP|Woodcutting|10|link=yes}} *[[Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup#Necessary items|Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup items]] |- | 6. Cook a [[Spider on stick]]. ''Alternatively, cook a [[spider on shaft]].'' | *{{SCP|Cooking|16|link=yes}} *[[Spider carcass]] and a [[skewer stick]] or an [[arrow shaft]] |- | 7. Charter the [[Lady of the Waves]] from south of [[Cairn Isle]] to [[Port Khazard]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Shilo Village]] *[[Ship ticket]] or 25-50 [[coins]] (the number of coins needed is random) |- | 8. Cut a log from a [[teak|teak tree]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Jungle Potion]] *{{SCP|Woodcutting|35|link=yes}} *Any [[axe]] and either 100 [[trading sticks]] if cutting in [[Hardwood Grove]], or a [[machete]] if cutting in [[Kharazi Jungle]] (requires starting the [[Legends' Quest]]). |- | 9. Cut a log from a [[mahogany|mahogany tree]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Jungle Potion]] *{{SCP|Woodcutting|50|link=yes}} *Any [[axe]] and either 100 [[trading sticks]] if cutting in [[Hardwood Grove]], or a [[machete]] if cutting in [[Kharazi Jungle]] (requires starting the [[Legends' Quest]]). |- | 10. Catch a [[raw karambwan|karambwan]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Partial completion of [[Tai Bwo Wannai Trio]] *{{SCP|Fishing|65|link=yes}}{{boostable|yes}} *[[Karambwan vessel]], some [[raw karambwanji]] and a [[small fishing net]] |- | 11. Exchange [[gems]] for a [[machete]]. ''Speak to [[Murcaily]] about [[Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup]], get some favour, fix at least one fence, then claim some sticks for helping. [[Safta Doc]] will then allow you to trade for machetes.'' | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Jungle Potion]] *[[Gout tuber]] and 3 cut/uncut [[opal]], [[jade]] or [[red topaz]] *Depending on the type of gems, respectively 300, 600 or 1200 [[trading sticks]] |- | 12. Use the [[gnome glider]] to travel to [[Karamja]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[The Grand Tree]] |- | 13. Grow a healthy [[fruit tree]] in the patch near [[Brimhaven]]. | *{{SCP|Farming|27|link=yes}} *Any [[fruit tree sapling]], a [[spade]] and a [[rake]] |- | 14. Trap a [[Horned Graahk]]. | *{{SCP|Hunter|41|link=yes}} *[[Teasing stick]], [[knife]] and any [[logs]]. |- | 15. Chop the [[Vines (Brimhaven Dungeon)|vines]] to gain deeper access to [[Brimhaven Dungeon]]. | *{{SCP|Woodcutting|10|link=yes}} *Any [[axe]] and 875 [[coins]] |- | 16. Cross the lava using the stepping stones within [[Brimhaven Dungeon]] (south-west of pipe squeeze with moss giants). | *{{SCP|Woodcutting|10|link=yes}} and {{SCP|Agility|12|link=yes}} *Any [[axe]] and 875 [[coins]] |- | 17. Climb the stairs within [[Brimhaven Dungeon]]. | *{{SCP|Woodcutting|10|link=yes}} *Any [[axe]] and 875 [[coins]] |- | 18. Charter a ship from the [[shipyard]] in the far east of [[Karamja]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[The Grand Tree]] *200 [[coins]] if travelling to [[Musa Point]] (or less with the [[Ring of charos (a)]] and/or completion of [[Cabin Fever]]) |- | 19. Mine a [[red topaz]] from a [[gem rock]].
''Can be found in [[Shilo Village (location)|Shilo Village]] or within the [[Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup]] minigame. | *Completion of [[Jungle Potion]], and alternatively also [[Shilo Village]] *{{SCP|Mining|40|link=yes}} *Any [[pickaxe]] |} ===Rewards=== {{Listen |align = right |title = Medium tasks complete |filename = Karamja Diary - all medium tasks complete.ogg |desc = The music that plays after completing all medium tasks.}} *[[Karamja gloves 2]] **While worn, increased [[Agility]] [[experience]] from redeeming [[Agility ticket]]s **While worn, 10% additional [[Agility]] [[experience]] earned from all obstacles in the [[Brimhaven Agility Arena]] *[[Antique lamp (Karamja Diary)|Antique lamp]] worth 5,000 experience in any skill above 30 *Access to the [[Stepping stone (Shilo Village)|stepping stone]] [[shortcut]] across the river of [[Shilo Village (location)|Shilo Village]] requiring 77 [[Agility]] ==Hard== {{Listen |align = right |title = Hard task completed |filename = Karamja Diary - hard task completed.ogg |desc = The music that plays after completing a hard task.}} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *[[Oomlie wrap]] *[[Pure essence]] *[[Nature talisman]] or [[Abyss]] access *875 coins *[[Raw karambwan]] *Any [[axe]] *[[Machete]] *Any [[pickaxe]] *[[Lockpick]] (bring multiple, as they can break) *Any [[crossbow (weapon)|crossbow]] *[[Mith grapple]] *[[Anti-dragon shield]] *[[Antifire potion]]s }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Skills Needed |- | {{Checklist| *{{SCP|Combat|100|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Agility|53|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Cooking|53|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Magic|59|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Mining|52|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Ranged|42|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Runecraft|44|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Slayer|50|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Smithing|40|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Strength|50|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Thieving|50|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Woodcutting|34|link=yes}} }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Quests required |- | {{Checklist|smallindent=yes|notoggleparent=yes| *[[Tai Bwo Wannai Trio]] *Partial completion of [[Legends' Quest]] **[[Family Crest]] **[[Waterfall Quest]] **[[Heroes' Quest]] ***[[Shield of Arrav]] ***[[Lost City]] ***[[Merlin's Crystal]] ***[[Dragon Slayer I]] **[[Shilo Village]] ***[[Jungle Potion]] ****[[Druidic Ritual]] **[[Underground Pass]] ***[[Biohazard]] ****[[Plague City]] }} |} {| class="wikitable lighttable qc-active diary-table" style=width:750px; data-diary-name="Karamja" data-diary-tier="Hard" ! style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- | 1. Become the champion of the [[TzHaar Fight Pit|Fight Pit]].
''It's possible to do this with only two people total in the pit, yourself included.'' | *[[Combat gear]] |- | 2. Kill a [[Ket-Zek]] in the [[TzHaar Fight Cave|Fight Caves]]. | *[[Combat gear]] |- | 3. Eat an [[oomlie wrap]]. | *[[Oomlie wrap]], or the requirements to make it ({{SCP|Cooking|50|link=yes}}, [[palm leaf]] and a [[raw oomlie]]) |- | 4. Craft some [[nature rune]]s from essence. | *{{SCP|Runecraft|44|link=yes}} *[[Pure essence|Pure]] or [[daeyalt essence]], and a [[nature talisman]] or access to the [[Abyss]] |- | 5. Cook a [[raw karambwan]] thoroughly. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Tai Bwo Wannai Trio]] (speak to [[Tinsay]] after the quest) *{{SCP|Cooking|30|link=yes}} |- | 6. Kill a [[deathwing]] in the [[Viyeldi caves|dungeon]] under the [[Kharazi Jungle]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Partial completion of [[Legends' Quest]] *{{SCP|Woodcutting|15|link=yes}}, {{SCP|Strength|50|link=yes}}, {{SCP|Agility|50|link=yes}}, {{SCP|Thieving|50|link=yes}} and {{SCP|Mining|52|link=yes}} *Any [[axe]], [[machete]], [[pickaxe]] and a [[lockpick]] |- | 7. Use the crossbow shortcut south of the volcano. | *{{SCP|Agility|53|link=yes}}, {{SCP|Ranged|42|link=yes}} and {{SCP|Strength|21|link=yes}} *Any [[Crossbow (weapon)|crossbow]] and a [[mith grapple]] |- | 8. Collect 5 [[Palm leaf|palm leaves]].
''You can pick up and drop the same palm leaf five times.'' | *{{SCP|Quest}} Partial completion of [[Legends' Quest]] *{{SCP|Woodcutting|15|link=yes}} *Any [[axe]], and a [[machete]] or level 79 [[Agility]] |- | 9. Be assigned a [[Slayer]] task by [[Duradel]] in [[Shilo Village (location)|Shilo Village]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Shilo Village]] *{{SCP|Combat|100|link=yes}} and {{SCP|Slayer|50|link=yes}}, '''or''' {{SCP|Slayer|99|link=yes}} |- | 10. Kill a [[metal dragon]] in [[Brimhaven Dungeon]]. | *[[Combat gear]], protection from [[dragonfire]] (such as a [[super antifire potion]]), 875 [[coins]] and any [[axe]] |} ===Rewards=== {{Listen |align = right |title = Hard tasks complete |filename = Karamja Diary - all hard tasks complete.ogg |desc = The music that plays after completing all hard tasks.}} *[[Karamja gloves 3]] **Unlimited teleports to the underground portion of the [[Shilo Village mine]] *[[Antique lamp (Karamja Diary)|Antique lamp]] worth 10,000 experience in any skill above 40 *Access to the underground portion of the [[Shilo Village mine]] ==Elite== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *[[Nature tiara]] *28 [[pure essence]] *[[Fire cape]] or [[Infernal cape]] *[[Palm tree seed]] or [[Palm sapling|sapling]] *[[Antidote++]] *5-20 [[Zulrah's scales]] *[[Calquat tree seed]] or [[Calquat sapling|sapling]] }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Skills Needed |- | {{Checklist| *{{SCP|Farming|72|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Herblore|87|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Runecraft|91|link=yes}} }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Quests required |- | *None |} {| class="wikitable lighttable qc-active diary-table" style=width:750px; data-diary-name="Karamja" data-diary-tier="Elite" ! style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- | 1. Craft 56 [[nature rune]]s at once from essence. | *{{SCP|Runecraft|91|link=y}} *28 [[pure essence|pure]] or [[daeyalt essence]], and a [[nature tiara]] or access to the [[Abyss]] |- | 2. Equip a [[fire cape]] or [[infernal cape]] in the [[Tzhaar city]]. | *Great [[combat]] skills and equipment to achieve one of these capes *[[Fire cape]] or [[infernal cape]] |- | 3. Check the health of a [[palm tree]] in [[Brimhaven]]. | *{{SCP|Farming|68|link=y}} *[[Palm sapling]], [[spade]] and [[rake]] *'''''Recommended:''' 15 [[papaya fruit]] to pay the gardener'' |- | 4. Create an [[Anti-venom|antivenom]] potion whilst standing in the [[Horseshoe mine|horse shoe mine]]. | *{{SCP|Herblore|87|link=y}} *[[Antidote++]] and 5-20 [[Zulrah's scales]] (5 per dose) |- | 5. Check the health of your [[Calquat tree]] patch. | *{{SCP|Farming|72|link=y}} *[[Calquat sapling]], [[spade]] and [[rake]] *'''''Recommended:''' 8 [[poison ivy berries]] to pay the gardener'' |} ===Rewards=== *[[Karamja gloves 4]] **Unlimited teleports to [[Duradel]] *[[Antique lamp (elite)|Antique lamp]] worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70 *10% chance of receiving 2 [[Agility arena ticket]]s, instead of one, upon every successful pillar tag at the [[Brimhaven Agility Arena]] *Free usage of Shilo Village's [[furnace]] *Free cart rides on [[Hajedy]]'s [[Shilo Village cart system|cart system]] *Free access to the [[Hardwood Grove]] *Access to the [[Stepping stones (Eastern Brimhaven Dungeon)|stepping stones]] [[shortcut]] leading to the [[red dragon]]s in [[Brimhaven dungeon]] requiring 83 [[Agility]] *[[Red dragon]]s in [[Brimhaven Dungeon]] will always drop [[Bank note|noted]] [[red dragonhide]] *All [[Metal dragons]], [[Bronze dragon|Bronze]], [[Iron dragon|Iron]], and [[Steel dragon|Steel]], in [[Brimhaven Dungeon]] will drop their respective bars in [[Bank note|noted form]] if toggled-on through [[Pirate Jackie the Fruit]] - can toggle on/off freely *1 free resurrection, per day, in the [[TzHaar Fight Cave]] (Not the [[Inferno]]) *Double [[Tokkul]] from the [[TzHaar Fight Cave]], the [[Inferno]], and [[TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges]] ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 14 April 2021 |update = Below Ice Mountain |change = All diary tasks to craft runes were changed to clarify they only can be completed with essence. }} {{Subject changes |date = 30 March 2017 |update = Interface Improvement & More |change = Pirate Jackie the Fruit is now the diary master for all of tiers retiring Kaleb Paramaya, the Jungle forester, and TzHaar-Mej. }} {{Subject changes |date = 16 July 2015 |update = Duel Arena Rework |change = Fixed misspelling of "receive" in Ardougne, Karamja, Morytania and Wilderness Diaries. }} {{Subject changes |date = 30 April 2015 |update = Mutagens, Mo & Much More |change = *Karamja diary now checks for the elite tasks being completed before stating you have completed all of the tasks. *You are no longer directed towards 'someone somewhere' after completing the Karamja Elite tasks. }} {{Subject changes footer}} {{Achievement diary}}
